home.heroDescription: Connect with people in your city for safe, local peer-to-peer trading and bartering. Trade using any currency cash, gold, silver, goods, or services. All payment methods are welcome.
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Buy and sell with confidence in your local community
home.step1Description: Find items near you by category, location, and price. Set your radius to discover local deals.
home.step2Description: Message the seller, ask questions, negotiate price, and arrange viewing or delivery.
home.step3Description: Pay with any currency, gold, silver, products, or services. All payment methods are welcome and encouraged.
home.step4Description: Confirm receipt, release payment to seller, and leave a review for future buyers.
home.trustSafetyDescription: {appName} is a local peer-to-peer marketplace for city barter and trades. We track meetings to keep everyone safe, and reputation matters — users who abuse or scam will lose access forever.
home.trustFeature1: 100% Free - No fees, no commissions, no hidden costs
home.trustFeature2: Flexible Payment Methods - Trade with any currency, gold, silver, products, or services — all methods welcome and encouraged
home.trustFeature3: Meeting Tracking - We track all meetings to keep you safe during local trades
home.trustFeature4: Zero Tolerance Policy - Users caught abusing or scamming lose access forever
home.trustFeature5: Reputation Matters - Your trading history and reviews build your reputation in the community
home.trustFeature6: Prohibited Items - No drugs, weapons, or illegal products allowed
home.trustFeature8: Secure messaging with no personal info shared
home.ctaDescription: Join your local P2P trading community. List items for barter or sale completely free. Build your reputation through honest trades. No fees, no commissions, ever.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.browseDescription: Browse thousands of local listings. Find products and services in your area. Buy and sell with your neighbors on {appName}.
marketplace.searchDescription: Find {query} in your local area. Browse listings, compare prices, and connect with sellers on {appName}.
marketplace.noResults: No listings found matching your filters.
